Description: On US-17 in the County of Essex, in the vicinity of Maryfield Rd; Turnout; Rt. 1215N/S (Essex County), motorists can expect delays due to standing water. The north right lane and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Standing Water - Advisory

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 134.2 in the County of Stafford, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled tractor trailer. The north right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Tractor Trailer

Description: On I-77 at mile marker 2.9 in the County of Carroll, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The north left shoulder and left lane are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash
